name: Apple Container Skill
description: Interact with the Apple Container CLI to manage containers, images, volumes, networks, and system services on macOS.

name: DevContainer Helper
description: Create and manage `devcontainer.json` files for consistent development environments. Supports configurations for Dockerfiles, Docker Compose, and pre-built images.

name: PDF Skill
description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and handling forms.

name: DOCX Skill
description: Create, edit, and analyze Word documents (.docx) with support for tracked changes, comments, and formatting preservation.

name: PPTX Skill
description: Create, edit, and analyze PowerPoint presentations (.pptx). Supports layout manipulation, slide creation from HTML, and content extraction.

name: XLSX Skill
description: Create, edit, and analyze Excel spreadsheets (.xlsx) with support for formulas, formatting, and data visualization. Includes formula recalculation capabilities.

name: Skill Creator
description: A meta-skill for creating new Agent Skills. Provides templates and guidance for structure, metadata, and resource organization.

name: Slack GIF Creator
description: Create animated GIFs optimized for Slack (emojis and messages) using Python. Includes tools for frame composition, validation, and file size optimization.

name: Webapp Testing
description: Test local web applications using Playwright. Supports server management, UI interaction, screenshot capture, and DOM inspection.

name: Internal Comms
description: Draft internal communications (3P updates, newsletters, FAQs, status reports) using specific company formats and templates.

name: Hugging Face Cli
description: Execute Hugging Face Hub operations via the `hf` CLI. Download/upload models and datasets, manage repositories, and run cloud compute jobs.

name: Hugging Face Datasets
description: Create and manage datasets on Hugging Face Hub. Supports SQL-based querying, data transformation, and diverse dataset templates (Chat, QA, Tabular).

name: Hugging Face Model Trainer
description: Train or fine-tune language models on Hugging Face Jobs using TRL (SFT, DPO, GRPO). Supports cloud GPU training and GGUF conversion.

name: Hugging Face Paper Publisher
description: Publish and manage research papers on Hugging Face Hub. Index from arXiv, link to models/datasets, and claim authorship.

name: Prompt Optimizer
description: Transform vague user prompts into high-quality, clear, and effective instructions optimized for AI models using prompt engineering best practices.

name: Jta
description: AI-powered JSON internationalization (i18n) file translator. Supports incremental updates, 27+ languages, and terminology management.

name: Appinsights Instrumentation
description: Instrument web applications (ASP.NET Core, Node.js) to send telemetry data to Azure Application Insights.

name: Azure Role Selector
description: Guide users in selecting and assigning the least-privilege Azure roles for identities based on desired permissions.

name: Nuget Manager
description: Manage NuGet packages in .NET projects using the `dotnet` CLI. Enforces verification and restoration workflows for version updates.

name: Project Memory
description: Maintain structured project documentation (bugs, decisions, key facts) in `docs/project_notes/` to preserve institutional knowledge across sessions.

name: Things3 Agent Skill
description: Manage Things 3 tasks, projects, and areas via a local CLI. Supports creating, updating, listing, and searching to-dos on macOS.

name: Web Artifacts Builder
description: Build complex, multi-component HTML/React artifacts using Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui. Bundles code into a single self-contained HTML file.

name: Test Driven Development
description: Guide for implementing Test-Driven Development (TDD) workflows: Red (write failing test) -> Green (write code) -> Refactor.

name: Using Git Worktrees
description: Create isolated Git worktrees for parallel feature development without switching branches in the main workspace.

name: Finishing A Development Branch
description: Standardized workflow for completing feature branches: verify tests, merge/PR options, and cleanup worktrees.

name: Pypict
description: Design comprehensive pairwise test cases using PICT (Pairwise Independent Combinatorial Testing) for requirements or code analysis.

name: Move Code Quality
description: Analyze Move language packages against the official Code Quality Checklist (Move 2024 Edition). Checks formatting, manifest, and best practices.

name: Plugin Authoring
description: Guide for creating, validating, and debugging Claude Code plugins. Provides schemas, templates, and best practices for plugin development.

name: Mcp Builder
description: Guide for creating high-quality Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers in Python or TypeScript. Covers design, implementation, and evaluation best practices.

name: Csv Data Summarizer
description: Automatically analyze CSV files to generate comprehensive summaries, statistical insights, and relevant visualizations without user prompting.

name: Postgres
description: Execute safe, read-only SQL queries against PostgreSQL databases. Auto-selects databases based on description and blocks write operations.

name: Deep Research
description: Execute autonomous, multi-step research tasks using Google Gemini Deep Research Agent. Generates detailed, cited reports on complex topics.

name: Article Extractor
description: Extract clean, readable text from web articles and blog posts, removing ads and clutter. Supports multiple extraction methods (reader, trafilatura).

name: Content Research Writer
description: Collaborative writing partner for researching, outlining, drafting, and refining high-quality content. Provides real-time feedback and hook improvements.

name: Brainstorming
description: Turn vague ideas into fully formed designs and specs through structured dialogue. Explores requirements, constraints, and trade-offs before implementation.

name: Family History Research
description: Plan and organize genealogy research projects. Creates structured research plans, citation guides, and evidence analysis reports before executing searches.

name: Tapestry
description: Orchestrate content extraction and action planning. Detects content type (YouTube, article, PDF), extracts it, and generates a Ship-Learn-Next plan automatically.

name: Ship Learn Next
description: Transform educational content into actionable 'Ship-Learn-Next' quests. Creates 5-rep progression plans focusing on shippable outcomes and reflection.

name: Youtube Transcript
description: Download YouTube video transcripts (manual or auto-generated). Supports fallback to Whisper transcription for videos without subtitles.

name: Video Downloader
description: Download YouTube videos with customizable quality (1080p, 4k, etc.) and formats (mp4, webm, mp3) using yt-dlp.

name: Image Enhancer
description: Improve image quality by upscaling resolution, sharpening details, and reducing artifacts. Optimized for screenshots, documents, and social media.

name: Imagen
description: Generate images using Google Gemini's image generation model (gemini-3-pro-image-preview). Creates UI mockups, diagrams, and illustrations.

name: Git Pushing
description: Automate the git add, commit, and push workflow with conventional commit messages.

name: Meeting Insights Analyzer
description: Analyze meeting transcripts to uncover communication patterns, conflict avoidance, speaking ratios, and leadership style. Provides actionable feedback.

name: Review Implementing
description: Systematically process code review feedback by creating and executing a todo list of changes. Ensures all comments are addressed.

name: Test Fixing
description: Systematically fix failing tests by analyzing errors, grouping them by type/module, and resolving them in dependency order (infrastructure -> API -> logic).

name: Systematic Debugging
description: A disciplined 4-phase debugging process: Root Cause Investigation, Pattern Analysis, Hypothesis Testing, and Implementation. Discourages random fixes.

name: File Organizer
description: Intelligently organize files and folders based on context, type, and date. Finds duplicates, suggests structures, and automates cleanup.

name: Invoice Organizer
description: Automate invoice and receipt organization for tax preparation. Extracts data, renames files consistently, and sorts into categories.
